data.title: Tony Allen, Basketball Player
data.meta_description: Tony Allen stats and bio. Stats averages season by season. Quick access to game by game stats.
data.text:
Tony Allen - Points

Tony Allen scores a career high 30 points (2006)

On December 15, 2006, Tony Allen set his career high in points in a NBA game. That day he scored 30 points in Boston's home win against Denver, 119-114. He also had 8 rebounds, 3 assists, 3 steals and 1 block. He shot 9/11 from two, 2/2 from three, shooting at 84.6% from the field. He also shot 6/6 from the free-throw line.

Tony Allen - Rebounds

Tony Allen grabs a career high 14 rebounds (2016)

On December 05, 2016, Tony Allen set his career high in rebounds in a NBA game. That day he grabbed 14 rebounds in Memphis's road win against New Orleans, 108-110. He also had 19 points, 3 steals and 1 block.

Tony Allen - Assists

Tony Allen gives a career high 7 assists (2006)

On April 04, 2006, Tony Allen tied his career high in assists in a NBA game. That day he dished 7 assists in Boston's road win against Toronto, 120-124. He also had 13 points, 3 rebounds, 3 steals.

Tony Allen - Steals

Tony Allen has a career high 8 steals (2012)

On April 23, 2012, Tony Allen set his career high in steals in a NBA game. That day he reached 8 steals in Memphis's home win against Cleveland, 109-101. He also had 13 points, 8 rebounds and 1 assist.

Tony Allen - Blocks

Tony Allen blocks a career high 4 shots (2006)

On March 20, 2006, Tony Allen tied his career high in blocks in a NBA game. That day he went for 4 blocks in Boston's home loss against LA Lakers, 97-105. He also had 18 points, 2 rebounds and 3 assists.

Tony Allen - Efficiency

Tony Allen records a career high 41 efficiency rating (2006)

On December 15, 2006, Tony Allen set his career high in efficiency in a NBA game. That day he accomplished 41 efficiency in Boston's home win against Denver, 119-114. He also had 30 points, 8 rebounds and 3 assists.
